description.p1: Passionate about machine learning and artificial intelligence, I am always looking for new ways to leverage data to solve real-world problems.
description.p2: Through my academic and personal projects, I have developed strong skills in Python, TensorFlow, and SQL, as well as a deep understanding of machine learning algorithms.
description.p3: I am enthusiastic about collaborating on innovative projects that push the boundaries of technology and bring real added value.
